name: Huddle
description: Established in 2006, Huddle creates cloud-based collaboration and content management software for the enterprise. Its patent-pending intelligent technology locates and recommends valuable information to users, with no need for search. Huddle is used by more than 100,000 business and government organizations worldwide, including the central US and UK government, AKQA, HTC and Kia Motors, to securely store, share and collaborate on content with people inside and outside of their organization. Huddle can be accessed online, on desktops and on the move with BlackBerry, iPhone and iPad apps.

apis.name: Huddle
apis.description: uddle is the #1 SharePoint alternative for Enterprise Collaboration and Content Management in the cloud and is used by more than 100,000 intelligent businesses globally.
